website_description_0: Welcome to Trails Orbment Assistant. This tool can automatically calculate the optimal quartz combination.
website_description_1: Currently only Kai no Kiseki is supported.
website_description_2: The algorithm used is simulated annealing. The results may not be the global optimum, so it is recommended to run it multiple times.
website_description_3: Thanks to Verne Company and Basel Institute of Science for their support on this project.
website_description_4: Some words are not translated because the game has not been released in English yet. We will update them once released.
development_text: If you have any suggestions or comments, or are interested in development, feel free to contact us!
quartz_table_instruction_0: Each quartz can be set to one of three statuses: enabled, disabled, or weighted.
quartz_table_instruction_1: Enabled: This quartz will be used by the algorithm.
quartz_table_instruction_2: Disabled: This quartz will not be included in the quartz combinations of the calculation results.
quartz_table_instruction_3: Weighted: If you strongly wish for certain quartz to be adopted, you can set its weight (1-10); the higher the weight, the more likely it is to be adopted.
shard_skill_rule_table_instruction_0: You can set a weight (1-10) for shard skills; the higher the weight, the more likely the resulting quartz combination will trigger this shard skill.
shard_skill_rule_table_instruction_1: When both lower-tier and higher-tier skills are triggered simultaneously (e.g., Earth Impact and Earth Impact II), only the weight of the higher-tier skill is used in calculations.
